channel.title: Item drop rate broken!
channel.description:
<ItemDropDef> <id>81</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>100</weight> </ItemDropDef> that's the codeing, no matter what weight i put in it drops 8 out of 10 times. (81 is r2h btw) I compress after editing put it back in the folder then i run server and client.
btw my greaters drop gold and bloods less often at 33 weight and 50 weight than my 2h's. 2h's seem to drop almost everytime :s

item.title: Item drop rate broken!
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

oh yeah, i forgot to say, if you want something to drop 100% of the time make it

<ItemDropDef> <id>81</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>0</weight> </ItemDropDef>
and make sure its above everything else, like you said you changed.

Read full topic

item.title: Item drop rate broken!
item.dc:creator: @StNicksBIG StNicksBIG
item.description:
@StNicksBIG wrote:

thank you, all i had to do was put something before the 2h’s drop code. now it drops every 25 kill.

Read full topic

item.title: Item drop rate broken!
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

its because you need to add more items, or change the weight like this,

<ItemDropDef> <id>81</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>1</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>1</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>100</weight> </ItemDropDef>
this will make it drop the r2h 1 in every 101 kills i beleive, and an iron mace every 100 kills, im not too fimilliar with the whole weight variable so i might not be 100% correct on this.

Read full topic

sorry got ahead of myself, it’s been moved
